description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。2018年当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会黑龙江省代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Han ethnicity and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. In 2018, he was elected as a delegate from Heilongjiang Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Heilongjiang province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，位于中国东北地区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, located in the northeastern region of the country.

en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的组成人员，是中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的成员。
description.en: A member of the National People's Congress, which is the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，胡江是黑龙江齐齐哈尔人。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Hu Jiang is from Qiqihar, Heilongjiang.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，胡江是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Hu Jiang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，胡江被选为黑龙江省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Hu Jiang was elected as a delegate representing Heilongjiang Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 胡江是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Hu Jiang is a political figure in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，胡江的头衔是全国人大代表。
description.en: According to the infobox, Hu Jiang's title is Deputy to the National People's Congress.
